attributes.action: encourage unemployed people to contra benefit claims for working hours!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Beat the recession, give unemployed hours to local businesses that can see profit/growth opportunities but can not afford to hire right now.

Trade off benefit claims for hours (£ / minimum wage = XX hours per week) and as industry starts growing, unemployed figures decline, country wealth increases.

Do this well, and the company supported to make profits, can convert the UK’s newly appointed ‘Recession Busters’ into full paying jobs.... a working route to employment perhaps, a working opportunity to get off benefits, a great way to keep active and mentally fit, but a huge chance for our unemployed to work the UK ‘up and out’ of recession. We have the skills – lets use them to benefit industry.

Visit www.ARecessionBuster.blogspot.com for full info before voting.

Please vote your approval – government can provide tools, but it’s we the people that must pick them and do something!

Let’s convert billions spent on benefits into billions of working hours!

Chris Rayner
www.eagletechnologies.co.uk

rejection.details: We cannot accept petitions containing links to other websites.
